About Me

I'm Bhushan from Goa — a Full‑Stack Developer with a strong focus on modern, fast, and accessible user interfaces. I have graduated from Goa College of Engineering (Information Technology) and currently work at deblur.ai. I enjoy building web and mobile apps, crafting clean UI with Tailwind CSS, and shipping features that users love. beside this i aslo like to work on machine learning projects and ai related projects.

What I do

  • Build responsive web apps with React, Tailwind CSS, and modern tooling.
  • Develop cross‑platform mobile apps with React Native and TypeScript.
  • Ship full‑stack features using Node.js/Express and REST APIs.
